name: Shadow's Journey
description:
I made this game for the Secret Santa game jam. Currently, there are only three levels.  Hope you enjoy it!

Play as Shadow, a mysterious figure that is trying to save the princess.

CREDITS

Smoke Particle - pedroricciotti

All Sound Effects - Joth
